meanings.definition: A synthetic drug used to treat anxiety and alcohol withdrawal symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed chlordiazepoxide to help calm my nerves.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on chlordiazepoxide to manage their anxiety.
meanings.sent3: After taking chlordiazepoxide, I felt like a weight had been lifted off my shoulders.
meanings.sent4: Her anxiety melted away like snow in the sun after taking chlordiazepoxide.
meanings.sent5: The calming effect of chlordiazepoxide was like a gentle breeze on a hot day.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly known as Librium.
meanings.sent1: My pharmacist explained that chlordiazepoxide is the same as Librium.
meanings.sent2: When I asked for Librium, the pharmacist gave me chlordiazepoxide.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mixed up my pills and took chlordiazepoxide instead of Librium.
meanings.sent4: The two medications, chlordiazepoxide and Librium, are like twins in different packaging.
meanings.sent5: Remembering to take both chlordiazepoxide and Librium can be a challenge.
